text: Lila Tretikov (; born January 25, 1978) was the executive director of the Wikimedia Foundation from 2014 to 2016. She is a specialist in software engineering. == Career == Tretikov was born in the former Soviet Union in 1978. She emigrated to America in 1994. She studied art and computer science at the University of California, Berkeley. In May 2014, Tretikov was selected as the future executive director of Wikimedia Foundation, replacing Sue Gardner and took up the post on June 1, 2014. == References == == Other websites == * Lila Tretikov talking about Sugar CRM * User:LilaTretikov, user profile on Meta-Wiki * Lila Tretikov Discusses NSA Lawsuit, Future of Wikipedia Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:People from Moscow Category:American chief executives Category:American software engineers
title: Lila Tretikov
